name: MKDistanceFormatter
desc: A utility object that converts between a geographic distance and a string-based expression of that distance.

items.name: func string(fromDistance: CLLocationDistance) -> String
items.desc: Creates a string representation of the specified distance.

items.name: func distance(from: String) -> CLLocationDistance
items.desc: Returns the distance value parsed from the specified string.

items.name: var locale: Locale!
items.desc: The locale to use when formatting strings.

items.name: var units: MKDistanceFormatter.Units
items.desc: The measuring system — imperial or metric — to use for units.

items.name: enum MKDistanceFormatter.Units
items.desc: Constants that reflect the type of units to use in the string.

items.name: enum MKDistanceFormatter.DistanceUnitStyle
items.desc: Constants that indicate the format style to use for strings.
